title: Ranked stats?
body: Why cant I view my ranked stats right now? Seems to be greyed out..

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Hit up the [Service Status link](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) on the left hand side of the page. In there you'll see that we're currently performing leagues maintenance which may be impacting your ranked stats among other related services.

Similar information is also displayed in client if you click on the ! symbol along the top of the window.

> Hey guys,
> 
> Hit up the [Service Status link](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) on the left hand side of the page. In there you'll see that we're currently performing leagues maintenance which may be impacting your ranked stats among other related services.
> 
> Similar information is also displayed in client if you click on the ! symbol along the top of the window.

I saw that, but it was 4 (or 6..) hours last updated and thought it'd be finished by now, and i didnt think 'lp updates unavailable' would mean 'ranked stats unavailable'

Thanks for the reply though!
It's saying im unranked and my riot friend said read the ticker but i have no clue what he means6
